      • getUploadUrl

        default java.net.URL getUploadUrl()
                           throws java.lang.IllegalStateException
        Default to : "https://tus.vectorly.io/files/"
        Returns:
        The url to which will be uploaded the video files
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if any error happens when building the url

      • getApiUrl

        default java.net.URL getApiUrl()
                        throws java.lang.IllegalStateException
        Default to : "https://api.vectorly.io/videos/"
        Returns:
        The base url to be prepended to other Uri to fetch data (videos, search, ..)
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if any error happens when building the url

        Returns:

        Throws:

      • getVideosListUrl

        default java.net.URL getVideosListUrl()
                               throws java.lang.IllegalStateException
        Build the full Url to get videos list. Default to [apiUrl]/list
        Returns:
        Url to get videos list
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if any error happens when building the url

      • getVideosSearchUrl

        default java.net.URL getVideosSearchUrl(java.lang.String keyword)
                                 throws java.lang.IllegalStateException
        Build the full Url to search videos. Default to [apiUrl]/search/[keyword]
        Parameters:
        keyword - video title
        Returns:
        Url to search videos by title
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if any error happens when building the url

      • getVideoDownloadUrl

        default java.net.URL getVideoDownloadUrl(java.lang.String videoId)
                                  throws java.lang.IllegalStateException
        Build the full Url to download a given video. Default to [apiUrl]/download/[videoId]
        Parameters:
        videoId - Video Id
        Returns:
        url to download the file from
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if any error happens when building the url

      • getAnalyticsSummaryUrl

        default java.net.URL getAnalyticsSummaryUrl()
                                     throws java.lang.IllegalStateException
        Build the full Url to list videos summaries. Default to [apiUrl]/summary
        Returns:
        Url to list all summaries
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if any error happens when building the url

      • getAnalyticsEventsUrl

        default java.net.URL getAnalyticsEventsUrl(java.lang.String videoId)
                                    throws java.lang.IllegalStateException
        Build the full Url to list events of a given Video by its id. Default to [apiUrl]/events/video/[videoId]
        Parameters:
        videoId - Video id
        Returns:
        Url to list events of the given videoId (Video play, pause, seek, ...)
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if any error happens when building the url

      • getApiKeyRequestHeader

        default java.lang.String getApiKeyRequestHeader()
        Default to "X-Api-Key"
        Returns:
        The http request header on which the Api Key will be put to be authenticated
